title: All in good, clean fun
content:
Okay, so i wanted a typotee of my own to wear while i'm waiting eagerly for the legit ones to show up in the mail. Since i'm impatient and resourceful...i figgered i'd make my own!   
 ![my creation](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725031709im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/34613.jpg)   
Apologies for the refelection, but otherwise how'd i do? Is my kerning okay? whaddya think?
author: pablohoney77

comments.content: LOL! I knew i could count on you Hrant! I think it musta been somewhat subliminal cuz PH are my initials I
I have my Graham shirt on right now, and wore my Mark shirt yesterday. Lookin' good!

I'm still an unofficial, unpaid Typophile, so, uh, there.   
   
In 20 years you'll rant about how "back in the day, Typophile took WEEKS to send out our shirts! I had to MAKE my own!"
"Nowadays, you young bucks just get your shirts beamed to you. In my day, they actually had to put them in a box and roll them to you in a wheeled conveyance."
"UPS didn't use those psychokinetic acceptance devices, we had to sign a digital John Hancock to get our shipment"
